using System;
using System.ComponentModel;
using System.Data;
using #Namespace##Class#Service;

#BeginNamespace#

    /// <summary>
    /// Service client code (generated by DataTierGeneratorPlus), to call service client proxy reference (generated by Visual Studio / svcutil).
    /// </summary>
    public static class #Class#ServiceClientApplication
      {
        /// <summary>
        /// Sample service client application code
        /// </summary>
        public static void Test()
        {
            BindingListView<#Class#Service.#Class#Contract> masterList = default(BindingListView<#Class#Service.#Class#Contract>);
            //#Class#Service.#Class#Contract masterInfo = default(#Class#Service.#Class#Contract);
            #Class#Service.#Class#ServiceClient #ClassVariable#Client = new #Class#Service.#Class#ServiceClient();

            #ClassVariable#Client.Open();

            //call service methods here, using opened service client
            masterList = #ClassVariable#Client.SelectInfoAll().ToBindingListViewOfContract();

            if ((#ClassVariable#Client.State != System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState.Closed))
            {
                #ClassVariable#Client.Close();
            }
        }
      }

#EndNamespace#
